## M-Pesa js-sdk test ðŸ˜Š
The main purpose of this project is to test the [mpesa-js-sdk](https://github.com/paymentsds/mpesa-js-sdk). Props to [paymentsds](http://developers.paymentsds.org/). To sign up  **M-pesa developer** portal, please visit this [link ðŸ‘ˆ](https://developer.mpesa.vm.co.m)

### Project setup
```
yarn install
```

Navigate to the root directory.
Create a file named ***.env***, copy and past the enviroment variables bellow:
```
MPESA_PUBLIC_
MPESA_API_KEY=YourApiKeyFromMPesaDeveloperPortal
MPESA_SERVICE_PROVIDER=171717
FROM_MOBILE_WALLET=84 XXX XXXX
```
Run 
```
node .
```
After execute sucessfully you should receive a USSD popup asking to confirm the transaction
Confirm and happy ðŸ˜Š payment
